001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client;
003
004import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
005import java.util.HashMap;
006import java.util.Map;
007
008import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.RecursiveToStringStyle;
009import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
010import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
011
012public interface ModelBase {
013
014    class FilteredRecursiveToStringStyle extends RecursiveToStringStyle {
015        static Map<Class<?>, Boolean> filter;
016        static {
017            filter = new HashMap<>();
018            filter.put(ZonedDateTime.class, true);
019        }
020
021        public FilteredRecursiveToStringStyle() {
022            this.setUseShortClassName(true);
023            this.setUseIdentityHashCode(false);
024        }
025
026        @Override
027        protected boolean accept(Class<?> clazz) {
028            return !filter.containsKey(clazz);
029        }
030    }
031
032    default public String reflectionString() {
033        return ReflectionToStringBuilder.reflectionToString(this, new FilteredRecursiveToStringStyle());
034    }
035
036    default public String reflectionString(ToStringStyle toStringStyle) {
037        return ReflectionToStringBuilder.reflectionToString(this, toStringStyle);
038    }
039}
